comments:
build I20041116

- Using the update manager, I disabled a feature previously installed via Update.
- It prompted me to restart, so I did.
- Got the following in the log on startup.

See also bug 79314.

not been reproduced since then. Please reopen if it happens with builds later
than I20041130.
